markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs=""
>
[Smokestick](/Equipment.aspx?ID=135)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 554 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

With a sharp twist of this item, you instantly create a screen of thick, opaque smoke in a burst centered on one corner of your space. All creatures within that area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Smokestick (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 554 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The radius of the burst is 5 feet.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Smokestick (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 554 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 53 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The radius of the burst is 20 feet.
name: Smokestick (Greater)
